title: Bots in TFT
body:
What is the deal with copius amounts of bots in TFT? I have only me 2 other humans in about 15 games, this is ridiculus.
Good way to ruin TFT guys ya fucksticks.

replies.body: They're not bots, they are releasing mobile TFT but it's restricted so everyone is set to default little legend and arena skin. There is no typing feature either so they can't reply to you.

They aren't bots. They are mobile beta players. Players from other regions are making throwaway accounts to test mobile tft. Oce and Euw (possibly Eune too) are the only servers testers can play on atm in closed beta. There is also no chat or shop functions in mobile and you cannot change your player icon. Which is why theres so many default players who do not respond in chat.
hey there is clearly no bot problem at all, why else would the reddit mods delete every post that mentions them
Yeah, it's actually rare to see another player now. :'c
Very annoying, i noticed it about the same time as you, im only Gold 2 and playing with nobody sprites. Not even competitive or interesting now, when before it was my go to game since it came out.

Yeah , tft sucks atm because of these bots, Its like a army of no icon river sprite bots has invaded the game , about a week ago in  plat 2 i would be playing with all high plats sometimes a few diamonds , now just put with bronze, silver, gold river sprite bots. Riot please fix this, It is ruining TFT.
Not only in OCE on EUW now as well (dia elo btw) thats just so dumb
Not bots, just mobile players. Likely smurfing to test mobile TFT and they're just better than you are. Don't feel bad.
High diamond EUNE bots are filled with bots, 5-7 /8 players

1 game full with bots
the bot win  with 5  champs 3 stars  with the right items  and best positions  
this bots ruined  TFT    thx riot
this is so true and needs more attention from riot. They are even diamond bots.
